p: So far, attempts to use gold and silver nanocolloids as elicitors in plant in vitro cultures have been limited. The addition of these substances increased the production of secondary metabolites in the cultures of Salvia miltiorrhiza [ 14], Artemisia annua [ 15], Brugmensia candida [ 16], Corylus avellana [ 17], Prunella vulgaris [ 18], and Aloe vera [ 13]. The influence of nanoparticles on plants depends on several factors, such as plant species, its age, growing conditions, culture medium, exposure time of the plant to nanomaterial, and administration method.
